# TT-RSS Counter

A Chrome extension that displays the number of unread articles from your Tiny Tiny RSS (TT-RSS) installation.

## Description

TT-RSS Counter is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you keep track of your unread articles in TT-RSS (Tiny Tiny RSS). It displays a badge with the count of unread articles and updates automatically at customizable intervals.
